Name: Sex Simulator - Love Room
About the game: An interactive sex simulation game, featuring realistic high definition graphics and characters. About the game Enter the world of Sex Simulator - Love Room, set in a luxurious and erotic bedroom. Choose between 3 girls and try and make them cum in this sex simulation game. Get to know the girls, answers a few questions about them, to get them undressed during the prelude. Control the sex motion in order make the girl cum before you run out of stamina. Choose between several types of sex (oral, normal and anal) to satisfy her. All sex scenes have different camera angles.
